title: How to write a letter to an organisation to start my online classes during this pandemic - Quora

response.answer_text: It totally depends on for which type of organization you are writing the letter.. But most of the time we write it in the format of formal letter and do send it through mail. Format for letter, To, The Director/HOD/Principal (Name of the Institution) (Address of the Institution) Date: _______ Subject: ( Write a relevant subject in 5–10 words which in short describes what you have written in your letter) Respected Sir/Ma’am, (Main Body of the letter) By mentioning your name start mentioning why are you writing this letter to them and what problems you are facing and why i was needed to write this letter to the concerned authority. (Do keep the body short in 5–6 lines so that the person can read it and resolve your issue). Thanking You, Yours sincerely/ obediently/ faithfully, Your Name (Designation) - As if you are a student then write student, if working professional then you must have got some title, mention that title. Hope it would be helpful...! For you.

That depends on the type of organization, although the most common way of contacting any organization, company, educational institution, or professional is via E-Mail. draft an email in the format of a formal letter, start by writing a good and precise subject, then follow this format- From ABC (YOUR NAME) ABC ( THE INSTITUTION YOU BELONG TO) ——( ADDRESS OF THE INSTITUTION) To ( DIRECTOR/ HOD/ OR ANY OTHER) ( NAME OF ORGANIZATION) Respected Ma’am/Sir (body) explain why you are writing that mail, what problems you are facing and why did you choose to approach them ( write in 4/5 line, should not be very long) please find so and so document in the attachment below ( if required) yours sincerely/ thanks and regards your name. Hope you find it helpful!
